   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "# МКР для решения 1D линейного эллиптического уравнения"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "dff4f188",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Постановка задачи\n",
    "\n",
    "\\begin{align}\n",
    "\\frac{\\partial}{\\partial x} E \\frac{\\partial u}{\\partial x} + f = 0\n",
    "\\end{align}"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "8e85a2dd",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Аналитическое решение"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 43,
   "id": "edaeb241",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",
      "text/latex": [
       "$\\displaystyle u{\\left(x \\right)} = - \\frac{x^{3}}{60} + 0.0176666666666667 x$"
      ],
      "text/plain": [
       "          3                       \n",
       "         x                        \n",
       "u(x) = - ── + 0.0176666666666667⋅x\n",
       "         60                       "
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 43,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "import sympy as sp\n",
    "sp.init_printing()\n",
    "\n",
    "u = sp.Function('u')\n",
    "x = sp.symbols('x')\n",
    "\n",
    "equation = (10 * u(x).diff(x, 1)).diff(x, 1) + x\n",
    "\n",
    "sp.dsolve(equation, ics={u(0):0, u(1):0.001})"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "id": "1d03fe3f",
